## trigger() function

Utility stream. Returns a new stream which emits a single value `x` (if given) and then closes. If no arg is provided, the stream emits a single `true`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function trigger(): Stream<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Stream<boolean>`
